original_text: When that has happened, God will save all Israel's people. This is written in the Bible: ‘The one who rescues will come from Zion. He will turn Jacob's people away from their sins. 11: Zion is God's city, on earth (Jerusalem) or in heaven. See Revelation 21:2. ‘Jacob's people’ is another name for Israel's people, the Jews. Jacob was Abraham's grandson and God gave him the name ‘Israel’. When that has happened, God will save all Israel's people. This is written in the Bible:
korean_text: 그리하여 온 이스라엘이 구원을 받으리라 기록된 바 구원자가 시온에서 오사 야곱에게서 경건하지 않은 것을 돌이키시겠고

sentences.original_text: God will save all Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 이스라엘 백성을 구원하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: This is written in the Bible
The one who rescues will come from Zion
He will turn Jacob's people away from their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 야곱의 백성을 그들의 죄에서 돌이킬 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Jacob's people is another name for Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱의 백성은 이스라엘 백성의 다른 이름입니다

sentences.original_text: and God gave him the name Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님은 그에게 이스라엘이라는 이름을 주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: God will save all Israel's people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 모든 이스라엘 백성을 구원하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: This is written in the Bible
